name: Simple iOS Style Sign Up Flow
description:
A simple iOS design pattern sign-up flow I had done for my workshop. Please leave a ❤️ if you find it useful!


Screens/States:

  1. Landing
  2. Sign up
  3. Enter OTP
  4. Error OTP


Link to the workshop: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofHOEiv9dWI&t=4327s


@amoghsrivastava on Instagram for help/feedback.
